title: Authors and Citation
Authors and Citation
text: Jambhekar M (2025). sparsevectors: Sparse Numeric Vector Operations. R package version 0.1.0.
code: @Manual{,   title = {sparsevectors: Sparse Numeric Vector Operations},   author = {Medhavi Jambhekar},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.1.0}, }

title: Sparse Numeric Vector Operations
text: sparsevectors package provides simple implementation sparse vectors R. sparse vector numeric vector entries zero; instead storing values, package stores non-zero entries indices. saves memory improves performance large, mostly-zero vectors.

title: Sparse Numeric Vector Operations
text: can install development version sparsevectors GitHub :

title: Mean of a sparse_numeric Vector — mean
text: Computes mean including zeros (without converting dense form).

what: Convert a Dense Numeric Vector to sparse_numeric — setAs
title: Convert a Dense Numeric Vector to sparse_numeric — setAs
text: Transforms regular numeric vector sparse representation extracting nonzero entries indices. Expands sparse vector back full numeric vector, filling non-stored positions zeros.

text: e1 + e2: Addition sparse vectors. e1 - e2: Subtraction sparse vectors. e1 * e2: Multiplication sparse vectors.
